topic: 7. Which of the following are advantages of using function points (FP) as a measure of the functionality delivered by a software application?
options: FP is a language dependent measure.
FP is a language independent measure.
FP can be computed before a design is completed.
topic_cn: 7. 下列哪些是使用功能点（FP）作为衡量软件应用交付功能的优点？
options_cn: FP 是一种依赖于编程语言的度量。
FP 是一种独立于编程语言的度量。
FP 可以在设计完成之前计算。
